description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to expand connectivity, mainstream use of mobile applications in strategic sectors in the government and support development of the local IT industry.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 1, Section I. B. Project Manual | Description :Implementation Arrangements: preparation and adoption ofthe Project Implementation Manual. | Due Date :31-Jul-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. A. 1.(a) | Description :Establish a Project Steering Committee (the "PSC"), chaired bythe Minister of Communications and IT to provide overall strategy guidance support and oversight of Project implementation. | DueDate :31-Jul-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. A. 1.(b) | Description :Establish a Program Implementaion and Coordination Unit (the"PICU") within MCIT, chaired by the Deputy Minister of MCIT provided with adequate resources and competent staff. | Due Date:31-Jul-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I. A. 1.(c) | Description :Establish a Project Management Office (the "PMO") within MCIT, tobe headed by a qualified PM Specialist, acceptable to the Association, and provided with adequate resources and competent staff. |Due Date :31-Jul-2011
